displayName: Ensure CONTROL_MANAGEMENT_PACK_ACCESS is not concerning and not diagnostic
rationale: A value of 'DIAGNOSTIC' for this parameter enables the usage of features related to the Oracle Diagnostic Pack and Oracle Tuning Pack.
error_message: CONTROL_MANAGEMENT_PACK_ACCESS is concerning and has a value of DIAGNOSTIC
ruleNames: Ensure CONTROL_MANAGEMENT_PACK_ACCESS is not concerning and not diagnostic
